overview:
With over ten years of professional experience in the web/branding/multimedia, Kevin is a hands-on leader who strongly believes in consistently raising the bar of industry standards in visual media communication.

Kevin’s passion lies in creating original concepts and innovative ideas for today’s web 2.0+ and mobile software development markets. Fremon’s creative eye and instinct for intuitive interface design, color weaving, and strategic branding is what has propelled his career in the tech industry. Having to know each project from the code-base architecture to the pixels you see on screen, Kevin believes in a harmonious balance of form AND function.

Today, Kevin is currently the CEO, Founder, and Creative Director of Don’t Blink Design, a Santa Monica based web development boutique that specializes in bringing entrepreneur’s BIG ideas to life.

Most recently, Kevin set his sights on a new vision by creating and co-founding Vibefeelr with the intention of making a significantly positive impact on the world and social media landscape.
